channel.title: Guatemala on fREW Schmidt's Clog (Coffee Blog)
channel.description: Recent content in Guatemala on fREW Schmidt's Clog (Coffee Blog)

item.title: Guatemala Xinabajul San Pedro Necta
item.description: Sweet Maria’s The dry fragrance of San Pedro Necta has nice sweet smelling dry fragrance, allusions to ginger snap cookies at City roast level with a mix of dark sugar and subtle spice notes, and Full City roasts shift to strong bittersweetness that is accompanied by wafts of raisin and cola. There’s a nice range of smells here, and adding hot water ushers in more roasted nut type smells in the light roast, whereas bittersweetness remains resolute at Full City, and breaking through the crust gives off an incredible smell of dark chocolate with dried fruit accents.
